predicate.note: Frames file for 'wail' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to grieve or protest loudly, to cry

example.name: transitive
example.text: At the hearing , Rep. Oakar started wailing about `` phoney baloney regulations '' that [*T*-1] would stand between her and `` housing for downtown Cleveland . ''
example.arg: `` phoney baloney regulations '' that [*T*-1] would stand between her and `` housing for downtown Cleveland
